resources.string: An ancient circular staircase leads down into these tombs that were tunneled into the bedrock during the age of the Antonine emporers (2nd century AD).

The city\'s main train terminal, Mahattat Misr, is about 1km south of Midan Ramla. If you are arriving in Alexandria and going to the city centre around Midan Saad Zaghloul make sure you stay on until this stop.
Mahattat Sidi Gaber train station serves the eastern suburbs. Trains from Cairo stop at Sidi Gaber before Mahattat Misr station, and most locals get off here
34-156 Al Sagh Mohamed Abd Al Salam, Sidi Beshr Qebli, Qism El-Montaza, Alexandria Governorate
34-156 Al Sagh Mohamed Abd Al Salam, Sidi Beshr Qebli, Qism El-Montaza, Alexandria Governorate
34-156 Al Sagh Mohamed Abd Al Salam, Sidi Beshr Qebli, Qism El-Montaza, Alexandria Governorate
This sprawling property was the summer home of controversial King Farouk who assumed power at the age of 16 in 1936.
An ancient circular staircase leads down into these tombs that were tunneled into the bedrock during the age of the Antonine emporers (2nd century AD).

Resembling an imposing castle fortress, this citadel was built in the 1480s by Sultan Qaitbey on the site of the Pharos Lighthouse, to protect the city from the crusaders who used to attack the city by sea.
